channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP Review Slider
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP Review Slider

item.title: CVE-2023-0260|2024-08-02T05:02:44.157Z -- unknown -- wp%20review%20slider
item.description: The WP Review Slider WordPress plugin before 12.2 does not properly sanitise and escape a parameter before using it in a SQL statement, leading to a SQL injection exploitable by users with a role as low as subscriber.
